title: MD
biography: Sangita Reddy is an Indian healthcare executive. She is the Joint Managing Director of Apollo Hospitals. She also served as President of the Federation of Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce & Industry (FICCI) from 2019.
aiSummary: Sangita Reddy is a healthcare management specialist with an H-index of 45 at Apollo Hospitals (Member). Has been published in Soil Science Society of America Journal, The Science of The Total Environment, Environmental Earth Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
